@pixi/graphics > PIXI > GraphicsData

PIXI.GraphicsData 

class GraphicsData

A class to contain data useful for Graphics objects

Constructor

new PIXI.GraphicsData(shape: PIXI.Circle | PIXI.Ellipse | PIXI.Polygon | PIXI.Rectangle | PIXI.RoundedRectangle, fillStyle: PIXI.FillStyle, lineStyle: PIXI.LineStyle, matrix: PIXI.Matrix) â†’ {}
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
shape PIXI.Circle | PIXI.Ellipse | PIXI.Polygon | PIXI.Rectangle | PIXI.RoundedRectangle

The shape object to draw.
fillStyle PIXI.FillStyle

<optional>

the width of the line to draw
lineStyle PIXI.LineStyle

<optional>

the color of the line to draw
matrix PIXI.Matrix

<optional>

Transform matrix
